Fire + Wind = Smoke
Earth + Water = Plant
Plant + Smoke = Incense
Incense + Smoke = Prayer
Prayer + Water = Holy Water
Holy Water + Prayer = Miracle
Miracle + Prayer = Answer  // 7



Gen 1 - 32 Elements -> 32 Total Elements
Gen 2 - 118 Elements -> 150 Total Elements
Gen 3 - 316 Elements -> 466 Total Elements
Gen 4 - 825 Elements -> 1291 Total Elements
Gen 5 - 2216 Elements -> 3507 Total Elements
